content: The reason of why CQM-108 R4 fail is value set OID: 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1110.48Name: Device Application. It is newly created value set which is not published yet
Hello Yanyan. Is this something we're able to address? Do you have the valueset or is it literally not available yet?
I committed it to the connectathon repo
You actually added a .xml file though. We don't process .xml. Needs to be converted to .json.
You actually added a .xml file though. We don't process .xml. Needs to be converted to .json.
Actually the bundling tooling did pick it up and converted it to JSON for the bundling

Really???
That's awesome. I did not know it did that. :)
Josh is going to post a .json version, regardless. It's cool it does that though. :tada:

Just talked to Josh and he said: "Yeah, it'll read any resource as xml and output whatever encoding is specified for the bundle" (we're defaulting to json).

So... apparently, that's known and expected behavior... for everyone but me.
